attributes.action: change legislation where small magnets are used in toys
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: each year many children in the UK are injured thru swalowing magnets that are place in toys we buy for our children and yet the toy companies are allowed to get away without issueing fair warnings about these magnets, toy manufacturures are morally bound to sort this out, I petition the PM to remove all dangerous toys containing magnets off toy shop shelves.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
